description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c9p8r","text":"Here we summarize the reccomendation released by 10X Genomics for processing fixed-frozen tissue sections while performing 10X Visium Spatial Gene Expression assay using the Visium CytAssist device. Please follow the link for the detailed official protocol on 10X Genomics website. https://cdn.10xgenomics.com/image/upload/v1680564483/support-documents/CG000662_Demonstrated_Protocol_VisiumCytAssist_FixedFrozen_H_E_RevA.pdf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":282,"length":142}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0FD0669CE62811EE96E40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://cdn.10xgenomics.com/image/upload/v1680564483/support-documents/CG000662_Demonstrated_Protocol_VisiumCytAssist_FixedFrozen_H_E_RevA.pdf"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"829ca","text":"Once the coverslip settles, immediately proceed with imaging or store slide laying flat at 4°C in the dark for up to two weeks. If storing multiple slides avoid any contact between slides.\nDO NOT exceed two weeks of storage time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41qs0","text":"Place the coverslip without introducing bubbles and wait for the mounting medium to settle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9oiie","text":"Coverslipping ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9llhu","text":"Place a Low Profile Thermocycler Adapter on a thermal cycler and preheat\nthermal cycler to 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nr0e","text":"Place slide on the Low Profile Thermocycler Adapter with the tissue side facing up.\nDry for 10 min at 37°C keeping the thermal cycler lid open.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"kq7b","text":"Submerge the slide in a tube containg PBS for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dm3de","text":"Submerge the slide slowly in a new tube containing Milli-Q Water for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4asot","text":"Submerge the slide slowly in a new tube containing 100% Ethanol for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"am3ta","text":"Submerge the slide slowly in a new tube containing  70% Ethanol for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etf55","text":"Submerge the slide slowly in a new tube containing  Milli-Q Water for 20 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tenk","text":"Remove excess water and add 100 µl mounting medium to uniformly cover the entire tissue section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ddtm","text":"Proceed immediately to H\u0026E Staining \u0026 Coverslipping.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck3sh","text":"Imaging ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eudm7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9latt","text":"Image each tissue section individually at the desired magnification using brightfield imaging settings (400x reccomended).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9mo19","text":"Rehydration ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6bgqe","text":"After imaging, proceed immediately to Coverslip Removal or store as described above. DO NOT exceed two weeks of storage time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"32tqb","text":"Coverslip Removal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"diqel","text":"Fill a beaker with 800 ml of Milli-Q water (replace the water after processing 10 slides).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7onpr","text":"Submerge the slide holding it parallel to the surface and with the coverslipped surface facing sideways.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqaen","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43mr5","text":"Hold the slide submerged until the coverslip slowly falls off from the slide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84ic8","text":"Gently dip the slide 30x in water to remove comletly the mounting medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dpu0f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bd8k","text":"Let the slide air dry for a minimum of 5 min until the tissue is mostly dry. DO NOT exceed 20 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v5d5","text":"Incubate slide on the Low Profile Thermocycler Adapter with the thermal cycler lid open for 3 min at 37°C to dry the slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cvkcl","text":"Proceed immediately to Decrosslinking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eobqq","text":"Destaining ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck16s","text":"Place a Low Profile Thermocycler Adapter in the thermal cycler and set the following parameters.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ouc2","text":"Lid Temperature- 42°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4cth","text":"Reaction Volume - 100 µl 15","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18mpt","text":"Run Time - 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r2og","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e84uo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5tvrq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["140","144","139"],"data":[["Step","Temperature","Time"],["Pre-equilibrate","42°C ","Hold"],["Destaining","42°C","00:15:00"],["Hold","22°C","Hold"]],"guid":"D6E98FA84B8C47AEA8C5784402A57DD5","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c6f56","text":"Incubation protocol for thermal cycler ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Step","Temperature","Time"],["Pre-equilibrate","42°C ","Hold"],["Destaining","42°C","00:15:00"],["Hold","22°C","Hold"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dggb8","text":"Place the slide in the Visium CytAssist Tissue Slide Cassette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44j3","text":"Add 150 µl 0.1 N HCl in a 6.5mm gasket along the side of the wells to uniformly cover the tissue sections (DO NOT introduce bubbles) and ensure uniform coverage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bjbmo","text":"Remove HCl by careful aspiration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7a79q","text":"Add 100 µl  0.1 N HCl along the side of the wells to uniformly cover the tissue sections (DO NOT introduce bubbles) and ensure uniform coverage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbq1o","text":"Seal the cassette and place the slide on the Low Profile Thermocycler Adapter at 42°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"28go4","text":"Close the thermal cycler lid and initiate Destaining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mdh9","text":"Remove the slide from the Low Profile Thermocycler Adapter and place on a flat surface. Some color leftover after the destaining is acceptable.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"88o7s","text":"Decrosslinking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ofpn","text":"Prepare the thermal cycler with the following settings.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dbevn","text":"Lid Temperature- 70°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn33k","text":"Reaction Volume - 100 µl ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1b65e","text":"Run Time - 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhri5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4r1vh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"90vfv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["172","123",100],"data":[["Step"," Temperature","Time"],["Pre-equilibrate","70°C ","Hold"],["Decrosslinking","70°C","00:30:00"],["Cooling","22°C","00:10:00"],["Hold","22°C","Hold"]],"guid":"006BE5328CAE4CC794EFB76D4FD35F8A","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fndhr","text":"Incubation protocol for thermal cycler ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Step"," Temperature","Time"],["Pre-equilibrate","70°C ","Hold"],["Decrosslinking","70°C","00:30:00"],["Cooling","22°C","00:10:00"],["Hold","22°C","Hold"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"algpa","text":"Remove all the HCl from the well corners.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5v71m","text":"Add 150 µl of diluted decrosslinking buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9i8k9","text":"Remove diluted decrosslinking buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7u3bm","text":"Add 100 µl of diluted decrosslinking buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c668h","text":"Re-seal the cassette and place the slide on the Low Profile Thermocycler Adapter at 70°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9qr6","text":"Close the thermal cycler lid and initiate the decrosslinking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6rpi1","text":"Proceed immediately to Visium CytAssist Spatial Gene Expression User Guide (CG000495).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1hmfo","text":"Submerge the slide 10x in a new water beaker (VI)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bi8md","text":"Remove the Eosin and submerge slide for 30 sec in a new water beaker (V).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dh3sl","text":"Place slide on back on the staining surface and add 1 ml of Eosin making sure to uniformly cover the tissue section. Incubate 1 min at room temperature. DO NOT use diluted Eosin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6s0p1","text":"Remive the Bluing Buffer and submerge the slide 10x in a new water beaker (IV).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nqi5","text":"Place slide on back on the staining surface and add 1 ml of Bluing Buffer making sure to uniformly cover the tissue section. Incubate 1 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bj13t","text":"Submerge slide 15x in a new water beaker (III).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"84ja1","text":"Submerge the slide 15x in a new water beaker (II).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14m88","text":"Remove the Hematoxylin and submerge the slide 5x in a water beaker (I).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c1fvt","text":"Incubate for 3 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79odc","text":"Cover the slide with 1 ml of Hematoxylin making sure to uniformly cover the tissue section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"69uej","text":"Place slide on a flat impermeable staining surface.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7n87t","text":"H \u0026 E staining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b792i","text":"Prepare 6 water beaker with Milli-Q Water to dip the slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnd0u","text":"Retrieve the slides holding the tissue from the -80 ºC freezer. The tissue sections should be 10 µm thick and placed within the allowable area for the CytAssist device. For Fisherbrand Superforst slides the allowable area is a rectangle with the lenght sides distant 5 mm from the slide edge, and with the width sides distant 15 mm from the frosted area and the plus signs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: 10 X Visium Spatial Gene Expression - Fixed Frozen Tissue Processing with CytAssist
title_html: 10 X Visium Spatial Gene Expression - Fixed Frozen Tissue Processing with CytAssist

versions.title: 10 X Visium Spatial Gene Expression - Fixed Frozen Tissue Processing with CytAssist
versions.title_html: 10 X Visium Spatial Gene Expression - Fixed Frozen Tissue Processing with CytAssist
